item.description: The story of transboundary water sharing in South Asia is one of competing fears and intertwined destinies. item.title: What’s happening at Dhaka airport is a symptom of deeper rot

It is both a threshold and a mirror, reflecting not just the physical state of a nation but the moral tone of its institutions.
